text: That sounds long, think Iâ€™ve worked out an automatic way. would just need to test it

Landing Pages in HubSpot aren't automatically added to your sitemap, you'd have to manually add them. Website pages and blogs are automatically added.

I haven't had any issues in the past where LPs show in search results and I've never added to robots.txt

Has anyone had LPs show in search??
if the Landing Pages don't have a noindex tag, they can and will be served in search results
Interesting, I've never been able to find the LPs via search, even with exact title tags, I'll have to do some tests to see if something changed
That sounds awesome Rob, good luck! I'd love to hear about the results
I added the noindex tag yesterday and its still in google lol. im so impatient :sob:
you can submit the URL via Google Search Console and have it Live Test it.
I've done that too, but it was years ago and didn't realize something changed
